biography_text: BUDD, Theodore Paul, a Representative from North Carolina; born in Davie County, N.C., October 21, 1971; B.S., Appalachian State University, Boone, N.C.; M.A., Dallas Theological Seminary, Dallas, Tex.; M.B.A., Wake Forest University, Winston-Salem, N.C.; business owner; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress (January 3, 2017-present).
